title: The Coding Caricature
caricature_prompt: Create a playful, exaggerated caricature of a person with wild hair, oversized glasses, and a big smile holding a joystick in one hand and typing furiously on a laptop in the other. Use bold contours and clean lines to highlight their coding skills and love for gaming. Minimal detail is best for line art and robotic arm drawing.
caption: A caricature inspired by your interests in coding, gaming, with exaggerated hands, arms, hair.
